Description: Pottery Tell El-Yahudiyeh ware juglet; wheel-made; cylindrical neck flaring slightly to rolled rim; vertical handle from below rim to shoulder; globular body with round base; horizontal and slightly diagonal combed decoration around body; traces of highly lustrous burnishing; surface dark grey with red-brown mottled areas.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Turner Bequest Excavations, Enkomi
Bibliographic references: Kaplan 1980 / The Origin and Distribution of Tell el Yahudiyeh Ware. (P. 319, Fig. 117.e)
